entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is described as exceptionally handsome with a straight nose, dark hair, and gray eyes. He received more admiration than Viktor Krum.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned alongside Cedric as receiving more admiration.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as struggling with Summoning Charms.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as not responding to messages and Hedwig refusing to come near him.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is described as refusing to come anywhere near Sirius.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as predicting Harry's death with more certainty than usual.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is mentioned as giving Harry extra homework for struggling in his class.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned alongside Harry as receiving extra homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as trying to reassure Harry in Professor Flitwick's class.

relationships.description: Harry struggled with Summoning Charms in Professor Flitwick's class.
Hedwig refused to come near Sirius, indicating a problem between them.
Hedwig refused to come anywhere near Sirius.
Harry and Neville were the only ones to receive extra homework from Professor Flitwick.
Hermione tried to reassure Harry in Professor Flitwick's class.
